boat.name: Bluebell
boat.full_description:
'Bluebell' is the original steel Bluewater 25, launched as 'Jolly Jac' and sometimes called Smuggler 25. The design is now known as Tradewind Atoll 25.

Reviewed in the yachting press very favourably, she is always a 'head turner' and 'Bluebell' gets admiring remarks wherever she goes.

Found without a deck and coachroof in a barn, she was rebuilt with two layers of 12mm marine ply topped with 20mm teak in 2014. Sadly, the air cooled Ducati engine and electrics were damaged beyond repair in 2016 and she was sold to new owners from Sandwich in 2017.
boat.short_description: 'Bluebell' is the prototype for the range Smuggler 25, now known as Tradewind Atoll 25.

for_sales.sales_text:
The original steel Bluewater 25, launched as "Jolly Jac" and sometimes called Smuggler 25 but now built in GRP as Tradewind Atoll 25 selling for an an astonishing 165,000 euro!!!

Reviewed in the yachting press at the time very favourably, and always a head turner, getting admiring remarks whenever we went into harbour. We found her minus deck and coachroof in a barn and rebuilt this with two layers 12mm marine ply topped with 20mm teak. Due to a mistake by a boatyard we employed to carry out some work, they reconnected the cockpit drains the wrong way around and the boat siphoned water when sailed hard and filled to bunk level before we noticed so ruined the air cooled Ducati engine and the electrics. Further damage was done by the RNLI ripping up the floorboards without waiting for the water to be pumped out above. This resulted in two areas of woodwork damage and the cabin doors. This is a relatively inexpensive fix but the engine will need replacing.

We do not have the time to do this at a distance, so reluctantly she"s up for sale. Up on the hard at Ridge on the West side of Poole harbour, fees are paid until April 2017.

4 and 3/4 berth, heads between main cabin and forepeak V-berth. 2 mains, several foresails. Plus we have a topsail (not currently rigged) and a mizzen never fitted. If you are up for a project then this is for you!
